paper_abstract: A linear (partial) functional system consists of linear partial differential, difference equations or any mixture thereof. We present an algorithm that determines whether linear functional systems are partial derivative-finite, and transforms partial derivative-finite systems to fully integrable ones. The algorithm avoids using Grobner bases in Laurent-Ore modules when partial derivative-finite systems correspond to finite-dimensional Ore modules. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Transforming linear functional systems into fully integrable systems
